snippet: Steve Matz, 20, and Johan Santana have their sights set on returning this season after having elbow surgery in 2010.
abstract: New York Mets pitching ace Johan Santana and pitching prospect Steve Matz are sharing the road to recovery, both having their sights set on returning this season after having elbow surgery in 2010.
lead_paragraph: Steve Matz, 20, and Johan Santana have their sights set on returning this season after having elbow surgery in 2010.

headline.seo: Mets Monitoring Return of Santana and Pitching Prospect Steve Matz
headline.main: Mets Prospect and Ace Share Road to Recovery
headline.print_headline: Mets Prospect and Ace Share Road to Recovery
